title: Journal Supplements
cleaned_text: From 2015, Biomedical Research and Therapy accepts to publish the Conference Abstracts from all International Conferences about biomedical science. All accepted conference abstracts will be published as A supplement of Biomedical Research and Therapy. As a supplement, readers can download single PDF file of all abstracts as a proceeding OR download a abstract. Each abstract will be registered with a DOI number for tracking and citation. If you want to publish a Supplement of Biomedical Research and Therapy for your conference, please contact us at: managingeditor@bmrat.org. [The first GENE AND IMMUNOTHERAPY CONFERENCE in Viet Nam 2013](http://gic2012.oncotherapyforum.com) Organizers: University of Science, VNU-HCM; Saigon Hightech Park, HCM city; Seoul National University, Korea Editors for Supplement: Ngoc Kim Phan, Sunyoung Kim, Thai Duc Nguyen Dates: 21-23th, March, 2013 Place: Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam >>> Read the Supplement [The 2nd INNOVATIONS IN CANCER RESEARCH AND REGENERATIVE MEDICINE 2015](http://www.biomedconference.com/index.php/GIC-VN/GIC-VN2015) Organizers: University of Science, VNU-HCM, Viet Nam; University of California, Los Angeles, US; A-IMBN, Phan Dates: 25-26th, September, 2015 Place: Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam >>> Read the Supplement [The 3rd INNOVATIONS IN CANCER RESEARCH AND REGENERATIVE MEDICINE 2017](http://www.2017.crrmconference.com/) Organizers: - University of Science, VNU-HCM, Viet Nam - University of California, Los Angeles, US - MD Anderson Cancer Center, The University of Texas, US Editors for Supplement: Thuoc Linh Tran, September, 2017 Place: Ho Chi Minh city, Viet Nam
